---
title: "Get started"
description: "File storage for your agents"
---

import FileStorageBasic from '/snippets/sessions/file_storage_basic.mdx';

File storage allows agents to upload and download files from websites.

Storage is persistent and session-scoped so that you can always download files after the session is closed.


<FileStorageBasic/>

## Parameters

<ParamField path="session_id" type="UnionType[str, None]" default="None">
</ParamField>
